de.esoco.lib.property

Interface StyleProperties

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserInterfaceProperties

    public interface StyleProperties
    Defines typical style Properties.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> ANIMATION_DURATION
      Integer: the duration of an UI animation.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> AUTO_HIDE
      Boolean: TRUE if an element should be hidden automatically.
      static PropertyName<Color> BACKGROUND_COLOR
      String: the background color of an element as a HTML color definition.
      static PropertyName<ButtonStyle> BUTTON_STYLE
      Enum: the display style for buttons.
      static PropertyName<CheckBoxStyle> CHECK_BOX_STYLE
      Enum: the display style for check boxes.
      static PropertyName<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> CSS_STYLES
      A map property that contains CSS styles and their values.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.String> DISABLED_ELEMENTS
      String: a list of disabled elements, e.g. of buttons in a list with discrete or immediate style.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> EDITABLE
      Boolean: TRUE to mark an element as editable.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> EXECUTABLE
      Boolean: TRUE to mark an element as executable.
      static PropertyName<Color> FOREGROUND_COLOR
      String: the foreground color of an element as a HTML color definition.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> HAS_IMAGES
      Boolean: marks a user interface element to be rendered with image if applicable.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> HEADER_LABEL
      Boolean: TRUE to display the label of an element as a header instead of a prefix.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> HIDE_LABEL
      Boolean: TRUE to hide the label when displaying the element.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> HIERARCHICAL
      Boolean: TRUE for the hierarchical display of data.
      static PropertyName<Color> ICON_COLOR
      String: the icon color of an ContentProperties.ICON as a HTML color definition.
      static PropertyName<LabelStyle> LABEL_STYLE
      Enum: the style in which a readonly text data element should be displayed.
      static PropertyName<ListLayoutStyle> LIST_LAYOUT_STYLE
      The style of a list layout.
      static PropertyName<ListStyle> LIST_STYLE
      Enum: the type in which a list data element should be displayed.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> MAX_CHARS
      Integer: the maximum number of characters to display.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> MIN_CHARS
      Integer: the minimum number of characters to display.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> MULTI_SELECTION
      Boolean: allow the selection of multiple elements.
      static PropertyName<NavigationMenuStyle> NAVIGATION_MENU_STYLE
      The style of a navigation menu.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> NO_WRAP
      Boolean: TRUE to disabled the wrapping in an element.

      Enum: The visual orientation of an element.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> SEARCHABLE
      Boolean: TRUE to mark an element as searchable.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> SHOW_LABEL
      Boolean: TRUE to explicitly show the label of an element.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> SORT
      Boolean: indicates that the values of an element should be sorted.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> SORTABLE
      Boolean: TRUE to mark an element as sortable.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.String> STYLE
      String: an application-specific style string (e.g. a CSS class name).

      Integer: the number of rows to display in a table.

      Enum: the type in which a text input box should be displayed.

      Boolean: TRUE to use a standard UI component instead of some variant.
      static PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> WRAP
      Boolean: TRUE to wrap data or sub-elements in an element.
